attributes.title: This app doesn’t work
attributes.review: It doesn’t work it keeps messing up I can’t do anything on it..it keeps making me sign in even though I already did I have no clue why but it keeps freezing when I’m on it and it messes up my phone and causes my phone to shut down

attributes.title: Please do not get this app; it can cause lots of bugs
attributes.review: I wanted to support President trump via this app, but it is very bugging and crashes my phone a lot. I tried entering my information to receive more details but it keeps crashing after I hit “submit.” I don’t recommend this app at all.

attributes.title: I wanted to leave a 5 star but
attributes.review:
Somebody once told me
The world is gonna roll me
I ain't the sharpest tool in the shed
She was looking kinda dumb
With her finger and her thumb
In shape of an "L" on her forehead

Well the years start coming
And they don't stop coming
Fed to the rules and I hit the ground running
Didn't make sense
Not to live for fun
Your brain gets smart but your head gets dumb
So much to do
So much to see

So what's wrong with taking the back street
You'll never know if you don't go

You'll never shine if you don't glow
Hey now
You're an all star
Get your game on
Go play

attributes.title: Will mess up your phone
attributes.review: Terrible app, thought it was going to keep me updated on the campaign and instead it took forever to download and then upon opening the app left a virus or bug on my phone and it’s been glitching ever since🙄 0/10 do not recommend this app

attributes.title: Terrible app!
attributes.review: Oh wow. Where do I begin. First off, the minute you open the app, you have to see DJTs hideous face. No one wants to see that. Second, it’s an app to spread misinformation to the redneck conservatives. Y’all need to evaluate your life decisions to support such a vulgar man. He is truly a disgrace. This app is terrible! I wish I could give it 0 stars!!!

attributes.title: “Orange 🍊 president “
attributes.review: So I had downloaded this app because it said it would give me money if I do. I wanted my money  so bad I even had to endure looking at the orange so called president. I waited and I waited  and the was no money. That pig lied to me and the app wasn't that good anyway. It was full of stupid dumb people and information. So I of course deleted it.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Downloaded this app to follow up on the 2020 election only to realize that the man trying to become president is an orange with less than two brain cell. This app is the most horrifying thing you could download I can’t believe this man actually exists am I dreaming. This app should be deleted ASAP it represents racism.

attributes.title: This app is the worst
attributes.review: They really need to take this app down just because of this app tiktok is going to be banned from the USA if you think this app should be taken down from apple keep writing about it people jobs in the USA are tiktok and there trying to take it  and this is the worst app created in the App Store

attributes.title: HE KIDNAPPED MY DOG!!!!😡😡🤬🤬
attributes.review: So, I downloaded the app to support our             ✨ cheeto✨and when I opened the app, it was just so terrible!! So I went back to the App Store, and I went to rate it 1 star, but right as I was about to submit it, Donald Trump teleported into my room!! He told me to rate it 5 stars and when I said no, he grabbed my dog and went back to the whitehouse!!!!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I’ve seen people using this app so I wanted to try it out for myself. Once I got it, there were so many problems. It kept deleting my reviews. I would definitely not recommend this app to any one. I advise you to stay away from this app due to all the problems.
